revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 72:;Pauni 3:;Ptolemaios, son of Satabous, grandson of Petheus, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 40;;Hatres, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Didyme, daughter of Argaios (Titikas);;(in left margin: drachmas 40 obols 16) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 7 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 4.5, naubion obols 4.5, surcharges drachmas 2;;eparourion drachmas 8 obols 2, surcharges obols 4 chalki 2, kollybos obols 2 chalki 2, in total drachmas 21 obols 2.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 18 obols 3.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2 chalki 2, in total drachmas 19 obols 5.5 chalki 2;;Thaubas, daughter of Sambas (Akous);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 4 obol 1, tax on the produce of olives 3.5, (in left margin: drachmas 20 obols 24)naubion obols 2.5, surcharges drachma 1 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 4 obols 2.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2.5, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obols 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 10 obols 2.5, surcharges obols 4, in total drachmas 11 obol 0.5;;Sisois, son of Onnophris (husband of Nike);;(in left margin: drachmas 4 obols 12) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 2 obol 1 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5, chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 2.5, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 5 obol 0.5;;Pakysis, son of Kastor, grandson of Pakysis, mother Teseuris, drachmas 12;;Pakysis, son of Sokmenis (Melanas, porter);;(in left margin: drachmas 4 obols 27) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5 chalki 2, naubion obols chalki 2, surcharges obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 2, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obols 5.5 chalki 2;;Petheus, son of Apollonios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 20;;in total for the day drachmas 152 obols 21.;(Pauni) 4 likewise:;Valeria Felicla (Ammon, son of Alimion);;(in left margin: drachmas 24 obols 8) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 10 obols 5, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 3.5, naubion drachma 1 obol 0.5, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 4 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 7 obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2, kollybos obols 2.5, in total drachmas 24 obols 3;;Mysthes, son of Teberis, grandson of Sambathion, mother Isidora, drachmas 4;;Aphrodisios, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, drachmas 8;;Phasis, son of Tesenouphis, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 4;;Pasion, son of Petsiris, grandson of Pasion, mother Thases, drachmas 4 copper obols 28;;Phaesis, son of Pekmeis alias Heremon, mother Sambathion, drachmas 8;;Maron, son of Petheus the younger, grandson of Anchorimphis, mother Apollonous, copper drachmas 4;;Petoraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris, copper drachmas 4;;Satabous, son of Dioskoros, cultivator of the 4th cleruchy;;geometria for the 12th year at the Patsontis district drachmas 2, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 2 obol 0.5 chalki 2;;Satabous, son of Dioskoros, grandson of Satabous, mother Tahorion, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Psenesis, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Komonis, drachmas 4."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
